And I've failed. Every-single-time.
Is this world truly fated to die? No hope? No happy ending?

â€¢---------â€¢Storyâ€¢---------â€¢

Silently, and without warning, an eruption from the Ruins of Teralolz tears into the night sky, leaving millions dead, and countless others behind to pick up the pieces of what remains. A fractured, broken world.

A lovable cast of friends and found family are drawn together by designâ€”by Her design. What begins as an ordinary day quickly unravels into something inevitable. Something's stirring. Something's waking up... and it will tear this world apartâ€”forever.

She'll move her pawns with purpose.
No will, no choice.
Only consequence and toll.

ğ“†©âŸ¡ğ“†ª
"You will be my Angel.
And, you, too, will play your role."
âœ§

â€¢---------â€¢What to expectâ€¢---------â€¢

â€¢ A deep, narrative-rich story told within the framing of an RPG.

â€¢ Battles are fast-paced. You control your battle leader while the rest of the party fights using Auto-Battle. You can swap behaviors using Paradigm Shifting, or by Swapping leaders mid-fight.

â€¢ Unlock character skits throughout the game. These are usually fun little moments for character development, but sometimes, they drop deep, dark lore bombs.

â€¢ You're accompanied by an animal buddy who can help out during combat. Also, he has the tude.

â€¢ With monsters visible on the map, you decide when and where you want to battle... or not. It's really up to you.

â€¢ Features a large ensemble cast. The narrative focus shifts between characters and parties as the story unfolds.

â€¢ Achievements build a picture. Nothing major, I just thought it was neat.
